answers.author: Caitlyn Mitchell
answers.text:
I apologize for not being able to answer your question fully within your time frame. I have been in contact with the local city access tv station in Phoenix, and they were not able to directly give me a sample contract. However, Steven Warren, the getleman I have been in contact with has offered to help you with more specific question. He has been very quick in replying and has asked me to pass along his contact information. I hope it helps. 
steve.warrington@phoenix.gov
602 262-4707
480 239-6979 Cell

author: Thomas Farnsworth
text:
I am looking for information, prefer a sample contract for video services for a local cable TV channel to provide coverage for City government.  Population 15,000.  Thank you for any help you can provide.
Tom Farnsworth
City of Pierre, South Dakota
title: Video Services Contract
